titleStmt.title: The vindication of an injured lady written by the Lady Francesca Maria Lucretia Plunkett, one of the ladies of the privy chamber of the queen-mother of England.
titleStmt.author: Loftus, Dudley, 1619-1695.

titleStmt.title: The vindication of an injured lady written by the Lady Francesca Maria Lucretia Plunkett, one of the ladies of the privy chamber of the queen-mother of England.
titleStmt.author: Loftus, Dudley, 1619-1695.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Dudley Loftus--Cf. Wing (2nd ed.) and DNB, v. 12, p. 80.
Translation of Lettera estortatoria--Cf. Wing (2nd ed.) and DNB.
Imperfect: stained; t.p. torn, with loss of publisher name and date.
Reproduction of original in: Trinity College (Dublin, Ireland). Library.
